transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, this is Harsh from Mahadev Engineering Company, sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Uh, Harsh sir, very good evening. Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha IndiaMART office Noida se. Sahi samay hoga aap se baat karne ka?
Customer: Batao sir, batao, koi baat nahi. Phone toh baji rahe hain bahut jyada, batao.
Executive: Sir, senior manager baat kar raha tha. Aapki abhi Muskaan se baat hui thi. Aapne call back arrangement ke liye bola tha. Toh usi wajah se maine call kara tha. Mujhe aap baat karna chah rahe the, thoda.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Thoda mujhe batayenge sir kya issue face kar rahe hain?
Customer: Sharma ji, Sharma ji, thode se, thode se aap meri baat samajhna thodi si. Aap bhi samajhdar hoge. Maine unko yeh baat batai thi, abhi NGT lagi hui hai. Meri payment kahin se aa nahi rahi hai. Maine phir bhi inko payment kara di. Abhi piche payment inhone bola toh maine phir bhi payment karai. Usse pehle payment karai. Matlab ₹1,03,000 mein kar chuka hu inko. Mere kuch ₹47,000 something reh gaye, ₹45 ya ₹47,000 something.
Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ab yeh ruk nahi pa rahe. Ab yeh mujhe pressurize, itna jyada pressure kar rahe hain ki hum band kar denge, yeh kar denge. Toh bhaiya aap bhi samajhdar ho, band karoge toh complaint karna mein bhi jaanta hu. Band kaise kar doge? Aadmi ki majboori toh har banda samajhta hai na? Aur ek baat batana, jab, jab meri pehle baat sun lo aap, mein phir aapko meri, aap apni keh lena, koi baat nahi. Maine jab payment di hai, payment dene ke baad mein mera yeh kareeban kareeban chalu jo hua hai na, woh 10 se 15 din ke baad chalu hua hai.
Executive: Ji, ji.
Customer: Ji. Rishi ji, sir aapka jab yeh chalu hoga na, uss din se aap jo, uss din se aap apna jodna chalu kar dena.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh maine, mein kya galat kar raha hu, mujhe yeh batao aap?
Executive: Mein aapko do cheeze batata hu. Sir dekhiye kya hai, Harsh sir dekhiye na, sabse pehle aap humare customer hain. Aur koi aapko pareshan nahi karega. Dekhiye sir, hum bhi as an employee yaha pe kaam kar rahe hain. Right sir? Ek company mein hota hai.
Customer: Are bhaiya, are bhai, mein aapki saari baat samajh raha hu. Ek baar, ek baar mujhe complete toh hone dijiye.
Executive: Ek baar mujhe complete karne dijiyega sir. Matlab mein aapko batata hu mein kya matlab process rehta hai. Uh, aapko koi harass nahi karega. Mein yaha pe likh dunga. Humare yaha pe sir kya hota hai na, jab hum aapke saath koi deal karte hain,
Executive: toh company ne hume mandate kara hota hai ki aapko PDC check lena hi lena hai 30 days baad ka koi bhi deal mein. Humne aapke scenario mein liya tha approval ki 30 days baad aap khud se hum karwa lenge. Right sir? Toh mein kar raha hu na phir aapki payment.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan haan, aap kar bhi rahe hain. Sir ek baar mein matlab mein aapko batata hu matlab thoda jo aapko call bhi aa raha hoga sir humare yaha pe kya hota hai na ek department alag hota hai jo sirf collection ke liye hota hai. Shayad aapko na kuch call bhi aa rahe honge.
Customer: Sharma ji, meri, meri baat suno Sharma ji. Abhi hai na kisi ladke ka phone aaya mere paas mein. Woh banda mujhe kuch alag.
Executive: Aap mujhe nahi pata ji kaun hai, kaun nahi hai. Unhone kuch alag tone se mere se bola ki sir aap payment kara do. Otherwise hum hai na aapka jo, aapka jo package hai na usko hum ek saal ka kar denge. Matlab ek saal ka matlab ki ji aapne jitna payment diya hai na uske hisab se kar denge.
Customer: Maine sir aise kaise kar doge?
Executive: Mein unse bhi yeh cheez bol raha hu ki sir humare saath mein kuch NGT ka problem chal raha hai. NGT ke chakkar mein kaam band pada hai humara toh.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir mein unko yeh request aapse karunga. Mein, mein aapko batata hu sir dekhiye aap agar aapka convert hota hai ek saal mein, hum aapke account manager hain. Mein Muskaan ki manager ka manager baat kar raha hu. Right sir? Aur mujhe 10 saal ho gaye hain IndiaMART pe sir. Dekhiye sir hum kabhi nahi chahte humara customer kisi cheez se pareshan ho. But sir actually kya hota hai.
Customer: Bhaiya meri baat suno, meri baat suno. Mein hai na, pehle din se mein Muskaan ji ko mana kar raha tha ki mere ko package nahi lena, nahi lena, nahi lena. Muskaan ji ne mujhe itna pressure kiya hai, itna pressure kiya hai, itna pressurize kiya hai ki sir le lo, le lo, le lo. Mein unko baar baar bol raha tha ki madam mujhe payment ka bhi jugaad nahi hai, mein pareshani mein chal raha hu. Mera kaam saara ka saara ruka pada hai. Aur aaj tak bhi mere ko do mahine hone wale hain, mujhe aaj tak bhi ek deal crack nahi hui hai. Balki unhone mujhe yeh baat boli thi ki sir aapka paisa nikal jayega, yeh hoga, woh hoga, falana ho jayega, dhikana ho jayega. Mujhe aaj tak bhi ek deal crack nahi hui hai, ek bhi deal. Maine balki madam ko tak yeh bhi tak bataya hai ki is IndiaMART ke chakkar mein maine do staff rakhe hain ₹20-₹20,000 ke.
Executive: Mein samajh raha hu, mein samajh raha hu. Sir dekhiye Harsh sir.
Customer: Mujhe ek baat batao, uske baad bhi mein paise de raha hu chup chap shanti se aur mere ko do baat sunne ko mil rahi hai. Toh sir mein sunne wala toh mein nahi hu.
Executive: Nahi, nahi, jo, mein, mein Nityam ka toh dekhiye sir Nityam jo hai na woh usi department se hain. Woh matlab na aapke account manager hain, woh sirf collection department se rehte hain. Mein ek cheez aapko bolta hu sir dekhiye, mein na sir 30th tak ka approval yaha pe leta hu aur sir dekhiye trust me, aap na matlab woh jo aapse keh rahe hain na ek saal mein convert, company ka na yeh policy rehta hai ki hum pro data basis pe convert kar dete hain. But mein 30th tak ka koshish kariye sir arrange karne ka. Mein toh sir fight le karunga.
Customer: Sharma ji, dekho bekar mein jhooth bol du. Nahi kar paunga sir, mein nahi kar paunga. Mein teen ya char tarikh tak hi kar paunga, usse pehle mein kar hi nahi paunga. Mein bekar mein jhooth nahi bolna chahta. Phir aap bologe mujhe ki sir karo, karo, karo, mein woh kar nahi paunga. Samjho baat ko sir.
Customer: Koi possibility nahi hai sir matlab ki.
Executive: Nahi sir, nahi hai. Possibility hoti toh mein aapko mana, mein aapko kehta hi nahi. Maine date hi uss hisab se di hai kyunki mere ko payment ka arrangement kahin se hone wala hai.
Executive: Sir credit card se try karwa lijiyega. Mein request hi kar sakta hu.
Customer: Nahi hoga sir, nahi hoga. Koi, mein credit card chalata hi nahi sir.
Executive: Sir itni badi company hai sir aapki matlab aisa toh nahi matlab hoga. Ek baar try kariye sir dekhiye mein, mein aapko itna bata raha hu sir jo bhi mein toh nahi chahta kuch bhi ho but sir trust me agar aapko lag raha ho ki hum chahte hain ki aapki service convert ho jaye, hum aapko pareshan kare, yeh company ka process rehta hai sir. Aur sir dekhiye aap toh genuine hain, aap toh apne tarike se genuine hain but aap bhi jaante hain ki aur bhi kai customer aise hote hain jo deliberately delay karte hain. Aapka toh genuine concern hai jaise aap bata rahe hain. Par mein requesting sir.
Customer: Meri baat samjho, meri baat samjho sir. Agar mere ko ek bhi order bhi crack ho jata na, toh mein payment sabse pehle aapki nikalta, apni nahi nikalta, pehle aapki nikal kar ke bhejta. Mere ko toh aise aise baatein batai gayi ki sir yeh ho jayega, woh ho jayega, falana ho jayega. Aaj tak bhi kaam nahi hua. Toh mein phir bhi aapko, mein sorry bhai se paise de raha hu. Pehli baat toh maine madam ko mana hi kar diya tha ki mujhe karana nahi. Matlab aap logo ko itni tarike se matlab aadmi ko lulupuchu karke ki bas paise nikal lo kaise tarike se aadmi se.
Executive: Ji sir, mein maafi chahunga agar koi.
Customer: Uske baad mein, uske baad mein sunna, uske baad mein sunna is tarike se. Toh woh cheez mein nahi chahta.
Executive: Nahi sir, sunana kisi ka right nahi hai. Sir sunana kisi ka right nahi hai. Aap customer hain aur aapne pay kara hai. Aisa kuch bhi nahi hai ki matlab koi aapko sunayega. But mein ek cheez aapko bataunga na sir.
Customer: Woh thoda woh aap sunna bol rahe the na mere se ki mein hum band kar denge, woh kar denge.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh karna agar woh jaante hain toh hum bhi karna jaante hain.
Executive: Sir band karna kisi ke haath mein nahi hota. Mein aapko batau sir dekhiye humare yaha pe na aap bhi samajhte hain sir aap bhi company run kar rahe hain. Different level hote hain, different hierarchy hoti hai. Agar humara kaam sirf hota hai payment collect karna. Duration ko badhana, ghatana uska department alag hota hai jinse hum baat bhi nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aap 30 tarikh ki koshish kariye sir mein itna hi bol sakta hu. Agar aap bolenge mein aapko dikha deta hu matlab yeh humari taraf se nahi hai. Mein aapko baar baar bol raha hu kuch nahi ho payega sir. Meri baat ko samjho. Abhi NGT chal raha hai. NGT ke wajah se mera kaam band hua pada hai bilkul. Mein jitna bhi aap kar loge na mein teen ya char tarikh tak hi kar paunga. Mein usse pehle, haan mein tabhi tak kar paunga. Mein usse pehle hoga nahi. Sir mein yeh keh raha hu teen char aap bol rahe hain koshish toh kariye sir thoda haath pair maar ke dekhiye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Are sir mein kaise koshish kar lu jab mere paas payment, meri baat suno sir mere paas payment tabhi aani hai. Baar baar ek hi cheez ko bol ke achha thodi lagta sir. Samjho na aadmi ko bhi toh, aapne samne wale aadmi ko bhi toh samjho aap.
Executive: Sir mein toh samajh hi raha hu sir, mein samajh hi raha hu bilkul.
Customer: Sir aap baar baar ek hi cheez ko mat bolo. Aap mat bolo baar baar ek hi cheez ko. Wohi cheez, wohi cheez irritated madam kar deti hain, aur phir wohi cheez aap kar rahe ho. Mein aapko samajh raha hu uss cheez ko toh aap samjho na meri baat ko bhi.
Executive: Sir aap ek cheez bataiye mein aapko kaise. Aapka incentive bhi hota hai isme. Aap log yeh karte ho na toh mein bhi jaanta hu incentive bhi hota hai aap logo ko. Magar itna pressurize karke kuch mat karo aadmi se.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, zero incentive hota hai sir isme koi incentive agar aap bolenge mein dikha deta hu. Deal convert sir company karti hai. Mein aapko dikhata hu sir mein aapko ek do cases na jo same scenario ke jaha pe deal convert hui hai sirf paanch che din pehle aur customer humare upar hi chillata hai aap bhi humare upar hi bolenge sir kyunki aapko lagega shayad hum deliberately kar rahe hain. Mein abhi WhatsApp mein add karke na sir aapko do cases deta hu. Woh dusri state ke customer hain, jhooth toh nahi bolenge na sir. Ek baar aap woh dekh lijiyega phir hum baat karenge. Mein aapko WhatsApp kar raha hu abhi. Ek baar dekhiyega.
Customer: Sir woh sab cheez rehne do. Woh sab cheez rehne do. Mein aapko time pass nahi kar raha. Ek baar dekhiyega toh sir ek baar. Agar aapne mujhe bataya mein toh apni. Par ek baar aap dekhiyega mein aapko WhatsApp kar raha hu. Ek baar nazar daliyega sir. Pehle aapko apni date bata di. Mein teen char tarikh mein payment aayegi mein tab karaunga aapko. Bas mein woh cheez bol ke chal raha hu.
Executive: Ek baar aap WhatsApp pe dekhiyega toh sir phir mein aapse baad mein baat karta hu. Aap pehle humare upar aapko trust hona chahiye baad ki baatein sir baad ki hain. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: 2021 mein aap dekho aapko koi bhi IndiaMART.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing financial issues due to NGT.

- Customer is being pressured for payment.

- Customer's account was activated late after payment.

- Customer is not getting any deals.

- Customer is receiving conflicting information from different executives.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive clarified the role of the collection department.

- Executive offered to try for 30th date approval.

- Executive offered to share successful deal conversion cases.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share successful deal conversion cases on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, ngt, deal crack, pressure, collection, incentive
